about_the_game:
In a distant unknown country covered with fog, our hero lives high on the mountains. Endless fights with rivals have made our hero an invincible Dragon. Just from one glance, the enemies run away. And even if there are daredevils who are ready to argue with the Dragon, they are overtaken by sharp claws. Therefore, nothing threatens you with this character!
Well, what about the dragon without its fiery breath in the game? Of course not! Therefore, in addition to the character, you will receive a gift in the form of an emoji "Fireball"!

After purchasing this content, you will receive the character "Dragon", "Fireball Emoji", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips in your collection.
